pros: Ideal for wide feet; Well-padded midsole; Comfortable upper material; Suitable for winter runs; Stable; Great for beginners; Ideal for easy runs; Excellent value
cons: Subpar breathability; Excessively heavy; Poor traction
RR_verdict: For $60, we think that the Adidas Galaxy 6 is a real steal—unless you're put off by its noticeable weight and lackluster breathability. But if you can roll with these, you're in for some premium perks: generous comfort in the upper, comfy cushioning, amazing stability, and a sleek look—all without breaking the bank. Oh, and we do believe that it's a stellar pick for those just starting their running journey!
use: Gym |, Jogging |, Walking |, All-day wear |, For beginners
